name: Spider - Classic Card Game
description:
The classic Spider Solitaire card game you played on Windows is now available to play on iPhone/iPad. Download now, and relive the familiar card game you know and love with the best Windows Spider Solitaire in the AppStore.

Also known as Spiderette or Spiderwort, Spider Solitaire is an extremely popular variant of Solitaire that will puzzle your brain for hours of endless fun! Your goal is to place all the cards in each suit in stacks of descending suit sequence. Weave your way as a beginner through 1 and 2 suit games and move up in difficulty as you attempt to tackle 4 suit games and become a true Spider Solitaire master!

FEATURES:
- New beautiful themes.
- Stunning animations.
- Flawless graphics and classic interface.
- 1 suit game (easiest).
- 2 suit game.
- 4 suit game (most difficult).
- Unrestricted Deal allows players to deal cards even with empty slots.
- Unlimited undo and automatic hints.
- Statistics.
- Game Center supported.
- Landscape or portrait view.
- Customized settings to suit your taste.

If you're enjoying Spider Solitaire, please take a few seconds to give us a review! azhuona@gmail.com
